data.lyric:
[ti:Robbery (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Robbery (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Robbery (Explicit) - Juice WRLD
[00:00.11]Lyrics by：J. Higgins/N. Mira
[00:00.22]Composed by：J. Higgins/N. Mira
[00:00.33]Man what
[00:03.56]This s**t funny
[00:06.68]I was like
[00:07.06]Oof this hennessy strong as f**k boy
[00:11.31]She told me put my heart in the bag in the bag
[00:14.99]And nobody gets hurt nobody
[00:17.89]Now I'm running from her love I'm not fast fast
[00:20.71]So I'm making it worse
[00:22.98]Now I'm digging up a grave from my past
[00:26.70]I'm a whole different person I'm a whole different person
[00:29.82]It's a gift and a curse
[00:32.11]But I cannot reverse it
[00:36.55]I can't reverse it
[00:40.23]It was a gift and a curse
[00:41.80]And now I'm drinkin' too much so I'ma talk with a slur
[00:44.94]Last time I saw you it ended in a blur
[00:49.63]I woke up in a hearse
[00:52.50]She said you loved me first first
[00:54.76]One thing my dad told me was
[00:57.32]Never let your woman know when you're insecure
[01:00.68]So I put gucci on the fur
[01:03.70]And I put my wrist on iceberg
[01:06.77]One thing my heart tells me is
[01:09.27]Flex on a ho every time they're insecure
[01:12.41]Ooh I'm running from you
[01:17.37]Is your love for real for real for real
[01:20.12]Is your love really true
[01:23.31]She told me put my heart in the bag in the bag
[01:26.80]And nobody gets hurt nobody
[01:29.11]Now I'm running from her love I'm not fast fast
[01:32.72]So I'm making it worse
[01:34.99]Now I'm digging up a grave from my past
[01:38.71]I'm a whole different person person
[01:41.85]It's a gift and a curse curse
[01:44.31]But I cannot reverse it
[01:47.76]You gave me the runaround
[01:48.84]I really hate the runaround
[01:50.23]You really got me paranoid
[01:51.84]I always keep a gun around
[01:53.33]You always give me butterflies
[01:55.54]When you come around
[01:56.69]When you come around
[01:58.21]When you come around
[02:00.21]You let me know love is not the answer
[02:03.17]Not the answer not the answer
[02:06.15]I love to do drugs so mind my manners
[02:09.13]I get high when you don't decide to answer
[02:12.17]Phone home I need to phone home
[02:17.54]I'm throwing rocks at your window I need to go home
[02:23.48]I don't wanna leave
[02:26.36]I just wanna be with you
[02:31.42]You you you
[02:35.43]She told me put my heart in the bag in the bag
[02:38.97]And nobody gets hurt nobody
[02:41.12]Now I'm running from her love I'm not fast fast
[02:44.82]So I'm making it worse making it worse
[02:47.56]Now I'm digging up a grave from my past
[02:50.71]I'm a whole different person I'm a whole different person
[02:53.84]It's a gift and a curse it's a gift and a curse
[02:56.59]But I cannot reverse it
data.trans:
[ti:Robbery (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Robbery (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.11]//
[00:00.22]//
[00:00.33]兄弟 怎么了
[00:03.56]这可真有意思
[00:06.68]我感觉
[00:07.06]这个轩尼诗酒劲有点大啊 兄弟
[00:11.31]她让我乖乖交出我的心
[00:14.99]这样才可免去一死
[00:17.89]如今我想摆脱她 可已无能为力
[00:20.71]事情越来越麻烦
[00:22.98]如今 我已经准备将过去全部埋葬
[00:26.70]我已经脱胎换骨了 我已经脱胎换骨了
[00:29.82]这既是上天的眷顾 也是诅咒
[00:32.11]但我无力反抗
[00:36.55]我无力反抗
[00:40.23]这既是上天的眷顾 也是诅咒
[00:41.80]此刻我喝醉了 说话含糊不清 
[00:44.94]上次我见到你 也是语无伦次
[00:49.63]我在灵车里醒来
[00:52.50]她说 是你先爱上我的
[00:54.76]我父亲曾经对我说过
[00:57.32]不要让女人发现你的恐惧
[01:00.68]所以 我穿着古驰的衣服来伪装自己
[01:03.70]手腕上戴着镶钻的手表
[01:06.77]我心里一直坚信
[01:09.27]要是女人觉得没安全感 就让她看看你的经济实力
[01:12.41]我要摆脱你
[01:17.37]你的爱是真诚的吗
[01:20.12]你的爱是真心的吗
[01:23.31]她让我乖乖交出我的心
[01:26.80]这样才可免去一死
[01:29.11]如今我想摆脱她 可已无能为力
[01:32.72]事情越来越麻烦
[01:34.99]如今 我已经准备将过去全部埋葬
[01:38.71]我已经脱胎换骨了
[01:41.85]这既是上天的眷顾 也是诅咒
[01:44.31]但我无力反抗
[01:47.76]你不停地跟我兜圈子
[01:48.84]我真的很讨厌这些弯弯绕绕
[01:50.23]你让我变得疑神疑鬼
[01:51.84]总喜欢把枪带在身边
[01:53.33]你总能将我迷惑
[01:55.54]当你靠近我时
[01:56.69]当你靠近我时
[01:58.21]当你靠近我时
[02:00.21]你让我明白 我们之间不是真爱
[02:03.17]我们之间不是真爱
[02:06.15]我喜欢** 为了你我会克制自己
[02:09.13]你犹豫着不肯回答我时  我很紧张
[02:12.17]打电话回家 我要打电话回家
[02:17.54]我正朝你的窗户扔石子 我要回家
[02:23.48]我不想离开
[02:26.36]我只想和你在一起
[02:31.42]你
[02:35.43]她让我乖乖交出我的心
[02:38.97]这样才可免去一死
[02:41.12]如今我想摆脱她 可已无能为力
[02:44.82]事情越来越麻烦
[02:47.56]如今 我已经准备将过去全部埋葬
[02:50.71]我已经脱胎换骨了 我已经脱胎换骨了
[02:53.84]这既是上天的眷顾 也是诅咒
[02:56.59]但我无力反抗
